July 3, 1954 D Selby Contest
Selby Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
selby-contest
None
Selby, North Yorkshire, England, UK March contest 1st Slaithwaite, 2nd Hade Edge, 3rd Hammonds. Deportment march 1st Hammonds, 2nd Hade Edge, 3rd Slaithwaite. 12 bands competed.
March 14, 2013, 9:55 a.m. April 17, 2019, 7:29 p.m.
1 Hammonds Junior Band Gershom Collison
2 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Gordon Roberts
3 Hade Edge Albert Robinson
4 Slaithwaite Band James Hickman
5 Harworth Brass J. C. S. Parkin
